page.title: 17CHILDRENS LEISURE PURSUITS
page.content: Most children enjoy going to the sports complex where they can enjoy playing many sports as well as watching films, roller skating and 'pop- mobility'. The children also play around on the Village Green where there are swings, roundabout and a slide. There is also a large hill that has been made and the children enjoy riding their bikes up and down this. In the Winter then it is an excellent sledging run. The children enjoy a lot of freedom to go off on bike rides during the warmer weather when they often take a drink and a small snack to eat. They also play in the fields and along the dykes making dens and fishing for tadpoles.
